resources.string: 请您输入您需要反馈的内容，如产品性能问题，请详细描述无法恢复的内容及有效的投诉理由，我们将会以您提交的内容描述进行审核。
请输入您用于支付的支付宝账号
请输入您的手机号(11位有效手机号)
上传图片（不超过3张 ,每张不大于1MB）
VIP专属客服，点击发起会话
全部会员可用，三个工作日内审核，审核结果短信通知
软件使用以及恢复等常见问题(非客服在线时间可以参考)
多选恢复和删除，长按查看详情
账户注销之后，您的所有信息都将会抹除，包括您付费记录和您享有的会员权限都将删除，您是否确定要继续操作？
优化图像纹理细节，使画面更加自然清晰
智能识别黑白图像内容并填充色彩
去除图片上水印等不需要的遮挡物
在尽量保持图片质量的情况下将图片无损放大
AI智能调节图片的清晰度
AI智能调节图片的对比度（鲜明程度）
AI智能重建可辨析的图像
AI智能还原过度拉伸的图像
付费修图功能上线啦！优质的线上修图服务，价格优惠，等你下单！为了用户能更好的享受图像付费修图功能的服务，请在下单时遵守以下规则：
本说明的解释权归照片智能修复软件服务平台所有
1.下单前请先与客服进行沟通，双方达成共识后再行下单哦
2.不支持非法修图。包括但不限于：修改合同、身份证、健康码、钱包截图、印章等，请大家自觉遵守。非法修图订单在平台内不接受保护,请用户谨慎操作。
3.为了确保大家最终能收到满意的图，请在下单前与客服及修图师将自己的需求进行充分说明，文明用语礼貌沟通，以保证良好的沟通环境。
4.当订单存在纠纷时，用户可请客服介入，客服有权限查看双方过往聊天记录。

PicEasy now!! More than 100,000 people used. Just with one tap, you can easily Enhance,Remove, Retouch, Cutout, Animation, Compression your photos and pictures.There is more than 16+ functions for you to become an editor master without any further complicated skills, and achieve the effects you want. The only thing we want to do is to make it easy to use for every user.
If you have any suggestions and feedback on the product, Please contact us

Hi there, thank you for choose PicEasy! If you encounter an error or bug, you may email to jxwl2020@gmail.com with the screenshot and your mobile details for us to investigate and advise further.Hope to hear from you soon.
The size of the picture and the network will affect the speed of the picture, pleaseWait patiently, the successfully processed pictures will be saved in the album.
"You can find picture from album , or open file manager and find it in a folder named \"Album\" if the task is done successfully. "
Please checked \"Privacy Policy\" and \"Terms of User\"
Privacy Policy and Terms of User

Read device infomation: Obtain the IMEI of the device, phone model and system version to generate the unique identifier of the device to generate a visitor number, and reduce the network requests of the device
Read and Write in storage space: All functions of the application need to read the album and then generate new photos to save to storage space or album.
We are going to ask for some permissions and tell you the purpose of our application:
Import a face picture, based on ai-face-algorithm, making a new faces of different genders
Photos with lost features and severely damaged facial creases are not suitable for smart repair
Remove unnecessary objects or occlusions in the picture, and fill them with background content to repair the defect content and improve the quality of the picture
The size of the image cannot exceed 4MB. The shortest side of the image must be at least 10px, the longest side must be at most 4000px, and the length and width must be less than 3:1
Enlarge the image twice in the length and width directions to keep the image quality intact
Blurred image intelligent noise reduction，and make the picture more natural and clear
Customize a unique animation image for you
The task head portrait can be transformed into cartoon painting
The photos taken in foggy weather were defogged to restore clearer images
Automatically recognize overstretched pictures and restore them to normal proportions
Adjust the contrast of too dark or over exposure images to make them sharper
The picture file type supports PNG/JPG/JPEG/BMP format, the picture size does not exceed 3MB, and the picture length and width product does not exceed 2000px*2000px
Intelligent recognition of black and white image content and color filling

The picture file type supports PNG/JPG/JPEG/BMP format, picture size does not exceed 3MB, the shortest side of the picture is at least 10px, the longest side is up to 2000px, and the aspect ratio is within 3:1
The photo is best in black and white, the effect will be more obvious
The size of the image cannot exceed 4MB. The shortest side of the image must be at least 10px, the longest side must be at most 4000px, and the length and width must be less than 3:1

Identify the range of human body outline, and separate from the background, suitable for background replacement, photo synthesis, body effects and other scenes. The scope of application is to expose the photo and the number of photos is not more than 2 people
Upload a face picture, based on face editing and generation algorithm, output a face old or young picture, support to achieve the change of different ages of the face.
Upload 2 to 5 clear face images and generate a portrait gradient video based on face editing and generation algorithm
Facial-level fusion of uploaded photos and specific images
Compression ratio and custom resolution may affect the quality of the image
